query:
-- Delete incorrect flights
DELETE FROM transportation WHERE tripId = 30001 AND type = 'flight';

-- Add corrected flights
-- Sep 1, 22:00 Israel time = 1725220800000 (Sep 1, 2026 22:00 GMT+3)
-- Sep 2, 01:10 Bratislava time = 1725232200000 (Sep 2, 2026 01:10 GMT+2)
INSERT INTO transportation (tripId, type, origin, destination, departureDate, arrivalDate, confirmationNumber, price, currency, website)
VALUES (
  30001,
  'flight',
  'Israel',
  'Bratislava Airport (BTS)',
  1725220800000,
  1725232200000,
  '',
  0,
  'ILS',
  ''
);
